document_data.mainbody:
ghilde was a bog hag that lurked in the Druids Deep of Thorngap during the late 15 century DR.
Aghilde laired in a discrete corner of the Druids Deep while the nearby druid Halsaime worked to conquer the world, until Harper agents arrived to eliminate the threat. They may have slain Aghilde and taken her ivy wraps.
